meanings.definition: To surpass in pulling or drawing power.
meanings.sent1: The tiny ant outpulling the heavy beetle amazed everyone.
meanings.sent2: The new tractor is outpulling the old one by a large margin.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel was outpulling the bird in the seed-pulling contest.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was outpulling any obstacles in her way.
meanings.sent5: The tug-of-war team was outpulling their opponents with ease.

meanings.definition: To exceed in strength or force.
meanings.sent1: The storm was outpulling the wind with its fierce gusts.
meanings.sent2: The champion weightlifter is outpulling all his competitors.
meanings.sent3: The superhero was outpulling the villain in their epic battle.
meanings.sent4: His passion for the project was outpulling any doubts in his mind.
meanings.sent5: The waterfall's roar was outpulling the sounds of the forest.

meanings.definition: To outdo in pulling or drawing.
meanings.sent1: The artist was outpulling her previous masterpiece with her latest painting.
meanings.sent2: The new fishing rod is outpulling all the others in the competition.
meanings.sent3: The magician was outpulling the audience's expectations with his tricks.
meanings.sent4: Her creativity was outpulling any limitations she faced.
meanings.sent5: The magnet was outpulling all the metal objects towards it.
